title: Faerie Tales
description: 12 all-new magical stories by Charles de Lint, Kristine Kathryn Rusch, Tanya Huff, and moreFaerie folk have cast their magical spell over people the world around. Now some of today's most imaginative fantasists explore into the heart of this enchantment with twelve all-original stories that will bespell their spells on readers of all ages.
author: Martin H. Greenberg
